[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/

# Visual Studio / MonoDevelop generated files
.vs/
.idea/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Unity Asset Store tools
Assets/AssetStoreTools*

# Autogenerated files
Assets/**/*.cs.meta

# Crash Reports
*.crash

# Ignore any secret configuration files
*.key
*.pfx
*.pem
